message: Awyamilig er Next nirbachoni Estehar.."Amra Juddho Oporadhir Bichar korechi But Ray karjokor Korte Pari nai,amader k Abar khomotay anun amra Ray karjokor korbo" [juddhooporadhir bicharer iccha thakle power a asar porer din e bichar suru kore dito,ey last muhurte ese bichar suru korto na!!!Babar theke o naki Desh boro tahole Age Bonggobondhu hottar ray karjokor kora keno holo,age Desh niya keno vabe nai???jonogon ey sokol velki bujhe geche]
